alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Butler County through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Augusta, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Andover, Augusta, Towanda, Benton, El Dorado Airport, Santa Fe Lake and Augusta Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
